sentence: chandramohan sharma koo-preducer aur leed aiktar akshay kumar kii maanein tou unaki naee film airlift kii kahani aur kirdar bilkul sachche hain. pahale khaadi yuddh koo cover karane vaale aeka senior reporter aur usa vakt air india mein uchch pada parr rahey aeka afsar iss kahani koo sach seey parey maanate hain. halanki, screen parr aap joe kuchh bhee dekhenge vaha sub sach key behad karib haye. bollywood kii khabaren apane facebook parr paanaa hoe tou like karein nbt movies film kii kahani chaar aham kirdaaron key ird-gird ghoomati haye. inn chaaron koo milakar aeka leed kirdar screen parr utaara gayaa haye, jise akshay kumar ney nibhaaya haye. yeh film pahale khaadi yuddh parr aadhaarit haye. iss jung key dauran kuwait mein fanse karib aeka laakh sattar hazaar bhaaratiya nagrikon koo desh vaapas laae jaane kii ghatana koo director ney apane andaaj seey pesh kiyaa haye. kirdaaron koo parde parr utaarane mein kuchh filmi aajaadi kii jarurat hoti haye, yahee aajaadi film key director raaja menan ney bhee lii haye. dekhiye, film kaa trailer  iss ghatana koo aur jyada asardar dhang seey pesh karane key maksad seey raaja ney film key kuchh seans koo dubai seey karib chaar ghante kii doori parr sthit russell khema mein jaakar shoot kiyaa. gujaraat key bhuj aur rajsthan kii outdoor location parr iss film kii adhikansh shooting kii gaee haye.  kahani : ranjeet katyal (akshay kumar), patni amrita katyal (nimrat kaur) aur pyaari-see betty key saath kuwait mein rahata haye. vaha shahar kaa naami businessman haye. khaadi yuddh chhidane key baad buri tarah seey barbad hue kuwait key aeka shahar mein raha rahey doosare bhaaratiya nagrikon key saath ranjeet kaa parivaar bhee funce jaataa haye. sarkari adhikaari haalaat seey nipatane key vikalpon parr vichaar curr rahey hain aur aise mein kuwait kaa raees businessman ranjeet apane prabhaav aur rasookh seey apani family aur fanse doosare bhaaratiya nagrikon koo wahan seey nikaalane kaa mission start kartaa haye. kuwait mein haalaat kharaab hoe rahey they. bhaaratiya senaa direct kuchh karane mein katra rahee thee. usa vakt ranjeet ney apane dumm parr duniya key sabse badey operation koo shuru karane kaa faisala kiyaa. acting : iss film mein akshay kumar ney aeka baar phir apane kirdar koo poori tarah seey jeevant curr dikhaaya haye. airlift mein akshay kumar ney abb taka key apane filmi currier kii behtareen acting kii haye. akshay jaba screen parr desh key rashtriya dhwaj key saath najar aatey hain, tou unake chehare kaa expression dekhkar holl mein baithe darshak iss seane seey bandh jaate hain.  akshay kii patni key kirdar mein nimrat kaur ney achchha kaam kiyaa haye. baaki key kalakaron mein purab kohli, inamul huck aur kumud mishra ney behtareen acting kii haye. direction : raaja menan ney script key saath puuraa nyaay kiyaa haye. director kii tarif karni hogi kii unhone boxes office kaa moh tyag curr kahani aur kirdaaron koo poori tarah seey mahaul mein sameta haye. vaheen film key lagbhar harr aiktar seey unhone behtareen acting karaai haye. warr seans koo bhee unhone parde parr poori tarah seey jeevant curr dikhaaya haye. unakaa kaam tarif key kaabil haye. sangeet : aisee kahani mein gaanon kii jarurat naheen hoti, lekin yahaan raaja ney gaanon kaa filmancan aise dhang seey pesh kiyaa haye, joe kahani aur mahaul key anukool haye. kyon dekhein : akshay kumar koo unake filmi currier key sabse behtareen kirdar mein dekhane key liye iss film koo dekhein. aggar aap achchi aur message dene vaali filmon key shaukeen hain, tou iss film koo family key saath dekh sakate hain.
label: positive

sentence: aggar aap iss film koo dekhane jaa rahey hain tou sabse pahale tou aap yeh zaan leejiye kii beshak iss film key saath praduyasar kumar mangat, director ashwini dheer key naam key saath paresh rawal kaa naam bhee judaa hoe lekin kuchh saal pahale aaee film 'atithi tum kaba jaaoge' seey iss film kaa kuchh lena-denaa naheen haye. yoon tou iss film key climax mein aapako pichhali film key hiro ajay devgn bhee najar aaenge lekin inn donon filmon mein sabse badaa fark yeh haye kii iss baar chaacha jee mumbai kii kissie society kii bajaay apane aeka anjaan rishtedaar key yahaan landan jaa pahuche hain aur iss baar chaacha jee key saath chaachi jee bhee hain. doosari or, 'gest inn landan' pichhali film seey totley alag haye. interval seey pahale director ney apani or seey aapako hansaane kii harr mumkin koshish kii haye lekin isamen jyada kamyab naheen hoe paae tou interval key baad climax mein film kii kahani mein kuchh aisaa turn aataa haye kii aapaki aakhen nama jaati hain. vaise, kumar mangat apani iss film koo bhee pichhali film key seekwal key naam seey hii banaana chaahate they lekin pichhali film kii production company seey kuchh vivaad key chalate baat naheen bunn paaee tou mangat apane atithi koo gest kaa naam diyaa tou mumbai kii bajaay gest key saath landan pahunch gaye. kahani: landan mein rahane vaale aryan grover (kaartik aryan) kaa work veezaa khatm honey vaalaa haye aur usey naan chaahate hue bhee work veezaa khatm honey key baad bhaarat jaanaa hii hoga. aise mein usake office key kuchh saathi salah dete hain kii aggar vaha kissie british mool kii ladki key saath deal karke marries curr leey tou usey landan rahane kii sthaai veeja aasaani seey mill sakata haye. aryan koo yeh idea pasand aataa haye aur vaha landan mein apani friends key saath raha raheen british mool kii anaaya patel ( kriti kharbanda) key saath milkar nakali shaadi karane kaa plan banaata haye. donon key beach aeka secret deal hoti haye jisake mutabik nakali shaadi honey taka anaaya usee key saath rahegi buss isake alawa inke beach aur koee rishta naheen hoga. issie beach aryan koo khabar milati haye kii india seey usake chaacha (paresh rawal) aur chaachi (tanvi aajami) kuchh dinn unake saath rahane key liye aaa rahey hain. vaise, aryan ney chaacha jee koo dekhaa taka naheen haye buss usake paas apane kissie rishtedaar kaa phone aataa haye kii usake padosi landan aaa rahey hain, kuchh dinn usake ghar mehmann bankar rahenge. anaaya seey shaadi kii deal key honey key baad anaaya bhee kaartik key ghar mein hii rahati haye. aise mein achaanak issie ghar mein chaacha aur chaachi jee kii entry key baad kyaa kohram machata haye, yeh majedar haye. film mein paresh rawal aur tanvi aajami donon kii acting kaa jawab naheen haye. inn donon key beach gajab kii onscreen chemistry kaa iss film kii sabse badee usp haye. vaheen chaacha jee ekbar phir pichhali film key chaacha jee kii yaad dilaate hain. kaartik aryan aur keerti kharbanda kii jodee cute aur freshes luggy tou donon apane-apane kirdar mein fitt bhee najar aae. director ashwini dheer kii interval seey pahale film parr kaheen pakad najar naheen aatee, aisaa lagata haye interval taka unake paas kahane key liye kuchh thaa hii naheen, lekin aakhiri bees minut mein dheer film koo track parr laane mein kamyab rahey. raghav sachchar aur amit mishra kaa sangeet kahani aur mahaul key mutabik haye, khaskar film key dou gaane 'daaroo witch pyaar' aur 'franky tuu sonaa nutch dee' kaa filmancan achchha bunn padaa haye aur genx kii kasauti parr yeh gaane fitt baith sakate hain. aggar aap paresh rawal key pakke phain hain tou gest seey milane jaaen lekin iss baar atithi vaali baat najar naheen aaegi.
label: negative

sentence:
bollywood vaale chori-chhipe hollywood filmon seey kahaaniyan aur drishya churaaya karate they. una parr naan kewal hollywood vaalon ney lagaam kasee balki apani hitt film 'night aind day' kaa hindi remake 'baing baing' naam seey banaaya haye. fox starr studio key liye dedh sou karod rupaye kii laagat seey film banaana mamuli baat haye, lekin hindi film mein itane daam mein shayed hii kissie ney film banaai hoe. 
 
itani mahangi film honey seey darshakon kii ummeed kaa badhana bhee swaabhaavik haye. film mein jabardast action, shandar location aur bollywood key dou khubsurat chehare hain, joe romanchit karate hain, lekin saath hii film mein kaee boriyat seey bharey lamhon koo bhee jhelana padata haye. film thheek-thhaak haye, dekhi jaa sakati haye, lekin aisee bhee naheen haye joe lambe samay taka yaad kii jaa sakey. jaruri naheen haye kii jyada paisa lagaane seey hii film achchi banati hoe. 
 
baink receptionist harleen (catarina caff) shimla mein boaring life jee rahee haye. jindagi mein romanch laane key liye 'true lava dott comm' website key jariye aeka anjaan shakhs vikki key saath vaha blind dett fixes karati haye. rajveer (ritik rotion) koo vaha vikki samajh letee haye. baat kuchh aage badhe isake pahale hii rajveer parr kuchh loga goliyon kii barsaat karate hain. paristhitiyan kuchh aisee banati haye kii harleen koo naan chaahate hue bhee rajveer key saath rehna padata haye. darasal rajveer ney kohinur heera churaa rakhaa haye, jise paane key liye pulis aur aeka gaing usake peechhe lagey hue hain.
 
film kii script koo subhash nayar aur sujoy ghosh ney likhaa haye. iss action movie koo harleen key najariye seey dikhaaya gayaa haye. harleen key dimag mein rajveer koo laker kaee sawal haye, joe darshakon key dimag mein bhee paida hotey hain. jaise vaha kaun haye? kyaa chaahata haye? usake peechhe loga aur pulis kyon padee haye? usaki aage kii kyaa yojana haye? kohinur heera usane kyon churaaya haye? inke jawab film mein lambe samay taka naheen milate hain aur kaee baar jhunjhalaahat bhee hoti haye kii aakhir baat koo itna kheencha kyon jaa rahaa haye. dheere-dheere sawalon key jawab milate hain, lekin inke jawab darshak apani samajh seey pahale hii paa letaa haye. 


film mein kahani jaisa kuchh naheen haye aur saaraa daromdar iss baat parr haye kii parade parr joe ghatanakram chala rahaa haye usake jariye darshakon koo bandha jaae. rajveer-harleen tathaa unako pakadane vaalon kii bhagambhag kaa suffer haye usamen darshakon koo majaa aae. poori film aeka climax kii tarah lagati haye. rajveer-harleen iss desh seey usa desh bhaagate rahate hain. iss bhagambhag mein action, romans aur comedy haye. yeye suffer kaee baar majedar lagata haye tou kaee baar boaring. action key aatey hii film apane charam parr aaa jaati haye, romans thheek-thhaak haye, lekin drama isaki kamjor kadee haye. film key villen kaa kohinur koo chori karvaane kaa joe kaaran bataaya gayaa haye voe behad lutcher haye.
 
film kaa nirdeshan siddharth anand ney kiyaa haye. aeka aise shakhs parr dedh sou karod rupaye lagaana jisane abhee taka dhang kii hitt naheen banaai haye, ashcharya kii baat haye. siddharth key saamane 'night aind day' maujood thee, isaliye unakaa kaam aasaan thaa. prastutikaran mein unhone dhyaan rakhaa kii yeh angreji film jaisi stylish lagey, lekin bollywood key formule seey bhee way butch naheen paae. khalnayak koo unhone tipical tareeke seey pesh kiyaa. siddharth key nirdeshan mein voe kasawat najar naheen aatee haye joe 'night aind day' key prastutikaran mein haye. 
 
film kaa action sabse badaa plus paint haye, havaai jahaaj, steamer, kaaron key jariye romanch paida kiyaa gayaa haye aur inn action seens koo bahut hii safai key saath filmaya gayaa haye. interval key thheek pahale kaar chasing seane lajwab haye. 
 
bollywood key dou sabse khubsurat chehare ritik rotion aur catarina caff kii jodee shandar haye. ritik rotion koo bahut cumm kapade pahanane koo diye gaye hain taaki way apani boddy kaa pradarshan curr sakey. iss roll koo nibhaane key liye jiss style aur attude kii jarurat thee usa parr ritik kharey utare hain. action seane unhone bakhubi nibhaae. catarina caff behad masoom aur khubsurat luggy. baat koo thodaa dair seey samajhane vaali ladki kaa kirdar unhone achh‍chhe seey nibhaaya. catarina aur unaki daadi key beach key drishya achh‍chhe hain. danny koo cumm footage mille hain. javed jaffrey aur pawan malhotra apani upasthiti darj karaate hain.
 
film mein dou-teen gaane achche hain. 'tuu merrie' mein ritik kaa dance dekhane layak haye. background music film koo bhavya banaata haye. photography, location aur takniki roop seey film damdar haye.
 
kull milakar 'baing baing' tabhi achh‍chhee lagegi jaba jyada ummeed laker theatre mein naan jaaya jaae. yoon tou film dhaaee starr key layak haye, lekin action kii vajah seey aadhaa starr atirikt diyaa jaa sakata haye.
 
banner : fox starr studio
nirdeshak : siddharth anand
sangeet : vishal shekhar
kalaakar : ritik rotion, catarina caff, danny, javed jaffrey, pawan malhotra
sensor certificate : yue * 2 ghante 36 minut
label: positive

sentence:
banner :
sanjay datt productions praa.ly., rupali ome entertainment praa.ly

nirmaata :
sanjay datt, sanjay ahluwalia, vinay chaukse

nirdeshak :
david dhawan

sangeet :
vishal-shekhar

kalakar :
sanjay datt, ajay devgn, kangana, arjun rampal, leesa haydon, chunky pandey, satish kaushik

sensor certificate : yuu/aeye * 2 ghante 8 minut * 15 reel



rascals key gaane mein aeka line haye ‘gaye gujare rascals’ aur yeh baat film parr ekdam sateek baithati haye. aisaa lagata haye kii iss film seey judey saare loga gaye gujare hain. film behad loud haye aur harr department kaa kaam kharaab haye. chaahe voe acting hoe, music hoe yaa direction. david dhawan apana midas touch khou baithe hain aur rascals mein comedy key naam parr behuda harkatein unhone karvaai hain.

sanjay datt sou pratishat isaliye film mein hain kyonki way nirmaata hain varna way iss roll key layak hain hii naheen. way pachas paar hain aur budhaa gaye hain. parade parr way apane seey umr mein aadhi kangana key saath chipka-chipki karate hain tou seane bachkaanaa lagata haye.

yeye baat sahee haye kii salman yaa aamir bhee apane seey kaheen chhoti umr heroine key saath parade parr romans karate hain, lekin way abhee bhee fitt hain. unamen tajgi najar aatee hain. yeye baat sanju baabaa mein naheen haye aur way film kii bahut hii kamjor kadee saabit hue hain.

aur bhee kaee kadiyaan kamjor hain. masalan kahani naamak koee cheej film mein naheen haye. dou chhote-motey chor aeka paise vaali ladki koo pataane mein lagey hain. ladki key baare mein kuchh bhee naheen bataaya gayaa haye kii vaha kaun haye? kitni ameer haye? jahaan vaha milati haye kii film key donon hiro usase aise chipatate hain jaise guda seey makkhi. film key 90 pratishat hisse mein yahee sub chalata rahata haye.

yeye sabhi loga bancock kii sevan starr hotal mein rooke hue hain aur vahee parr david ney poori film banaa daali haye. hotal kii lobby, swimming pull, room, garden koee hissa unhone naheen chhoda haye. dher saare haasya drishyon koo jodkar unhone film taiyar curr dee haye. inn drishyon mein bhee itna dumm naheen haye kii darshak kahani kii baat bhool jaaen.

yunus sejwal kaa screenplay behad ghatiya haye aur saikadon baar dekhe hue drishyon koo unhone phir parosa haye. kuchh hii aise drishya hain jinhen dekh muskan aatee haye tou doosari or foohad drishyon kii sankhya jyada haye. aeka prasang mein tou bhookhe aur garib bachchon taka kaa majaak banaa daalaa haye.

film key climax mein darshakon koo chaunkaane kii asafal koshish kii gaee haye. samvaadon key naam parr sanjay chhail ney ghatiya tukbandi likh dee haye, jaise bhosale key haunsale ney dushmanon key ghosale toda diye yaa jindagi mein maut, filmon mein itum number aur yeye anthany kabhi bhee tapak sakata haye.

nirdeshak key roop mein david dhawan prabhaavit naheen karate hain. adhure munn seey unhone film poori kii haye. ajay devgn ney apana puuraa jore lagaaya haye, lekin kharaab script kii kamiyon koo way naheen dhank paae. sanjay datt kaa abhinay behad kharaab haye aur unhein umr key mutabik roll hii chunana chaahiye. kuchh drishyon mein way wig key tou kuchh mein binaa wig key najar aaen.
comedy karna kangana kii buss kii baat naheen haye yeye baat aeka baar phir saabit hoe gaee. unakaa makeup bhee film mein behad kharaab thaa. chhote-seey roll meey leesa haydon prabhaavit karati hain. ‘shake itt sainya’ mein way sexi najar aaeen.

satish kaushik, chunky pandey jaise baasi cheharon ney boor karane mein koee kasar baaki naheen rakhee. anil dhawan film key nirdeshak key badey bhaai hain, isaliye way bhee chhote-seey roll mein najar aaen, lekin unase samvaad bolate naheen bunn rahey they. arjun rampal ney apana kaam thheek seey kiyaa haye.

vishal-shekhar dwara sangeetbaddh gaane jaba parade parr aatey hain tou darshak unakaa upayog break key liye karate hain. takniki roop seey film ausat haye.

aeka achchi haasya film key liye umda situation, actors kii timing aur chuteele samvaad behad jaruri haye. afsos kii baat yeye haye kii rascals harr mamle mein kamjor haye.
label: negative

sentence:
1959 mein ghatit charchit nanavati kaand mein aeka crime thriller banane key saare guna maujood hain. aeka officer, usaki akeli patni, pati key dost key saath affair, aeka murder, adalat mein jordar bahas aur deshbhakti koo laker badhiya film banaai jaa sakati haye. aisaa naheen haye kii pahale prayaas naheen hue. yeye raaste hain pyaar key aur achaanak iss ghatana seey hii prerit hocker banaai gaee thee. 
 
57 varsh poorv ghatey iss ghatanakram koo laker nirdeshak teenu suresh desai ney akshay kumar koo laker 'rustam' banaai haye. iss film koo bhee prerit hii kahaa jaayega kyonki isamen kalpana key kuchh reshe bhee daal diye gaye hain. film koo manoranjak banaane key chakkar mein nirdeshak aur lekhak thode bahak gaye jisase iss thriller kii gambhirta cumm hui haye aur film utanaa majaa naheen dey paati hain. 
 
rustam pawri (akshay kumar) nevi mein officer haye. maheenon vaha ghar seey door rahata haye. iss dauran usaki patni synthia (ileana dcruz) rustam key dost vikram (arjan bajwa) kii or aakarshit hoe jaati haye aur aeka raat donon tamaam seemaon koo toda dete hain. synthia koo galati kaa ahsas hotaa haye. vaha apane pati koo iss baare mein bataae isake pahale hii rustam koo yeh baat pataa chala jaati haye. vaha vikram kii hatyaa curr detaa haye. adalat mein usa parr mukadama chalata haye jisamen vaha khud kii pairavi kartaa haye. kiss tarah seey rustam apane aapako nirdosh saabit kartaa haye yeh film kaa saar haye. 
 
iss kahani mein suspenses jaisa jyada kuchh naheen haye. sub kuchh saaf haye kii kisane hatyaa kii haye aur kyon kii haye. mamla court room drame parr bahut jyada nirbhar haye. nirdeshak teenu desai aur lekhak vipul key. rawal ney apane patte (ghatanakram) shuruat key pandrah minut mein hii khol diye hain. patni kii bevafai kaa raaj aur usake premi kii hatyaa iss dauran hoe jaati haye isase utsukta jaagati haye kii abb film koo kaise sameta jaayega, lekin dheere-dheere nirdeshak aur lekhak key haath seey film fisalane lagati haye. khoob failaav aur dohrao najar aataa haye. film mein manoranjan kaa star oopar-neeche hotaa rahata haye aur film anta taka pahunchane mein lamba samay letee haye. 


film kaa pahala haaf thheek haye. iss dauran kahani koo khoob ghumaaya-firaya gayaa haye aur darshakon kii utsukta koo banaae rakhaa haye. doosare haaf kaa 90 pratishat samay adalat mein katata haye. yahaan parr lekhak seey chook yeh hoe gaee haye kii unhone adalat vaale ghatanakram koo gambhir naheen rakhaa haye. shayed way darshak koo tanaav naheen denaa chaahate they isaliye hansaane key liye unhone kuchh drishya rakhe hain joe betuke lagate hain, kahani kii gambhirta koo cumm karate hain aur film koo usa vaastaviktaa seey door leey jaate hain.
	
	rust maam key tikat book karane key liye click karein 
 
darshakon koo joe cheej film seey baandh curr rakhti haye voe haye kahani. iss kahani mein voe pakad haye jisaki vajah seey darshak anta taka baithaa rahata haye. saath hii kahani mein joe deshprem aur rashtra‍bhakti vaalaa resha daalaa gayaa haye vaha film koo taakat detaa haye. film darshaati haye kii bhrashtachar kii jarh bahut purani haye. 
 
teenu suresh desai kaa nirdeshak aur prastutikaran varshon purani filmon jaisa haye. way usa formule parr kaam karate najar aae kii dou gambhir drishya hoe gaye hain abb darshakon koo relax karane key liye aeka haasya drishya beach mein daal dou. film parr seey unakaa niyantran baar-baar chhootata rahaa haye. drame mein way thrill bhee paida naheen curr paae aur natakiyata kaa putt unhone jyada daal diyaa haye. 
 
1959 kaa samay dikhaane mein kuchh atirikt hii prayaas kiye gaye hain. iss vajah seey kuchh kirdar caricature bunn gaye hain. naan kewal way ajib dikhate hain balki ajib vyavhaar bhee karate hain. takniki team seey bhee nirdeshak koo sahyog naheen milaa haye. effect‍sus kamjor hain. rangon kaa sanyojan itna kharaab haye kii rung aankhon koo chubhate hain. 
 
film kaa background music behad loud hain. nirdeshak koo parshvasangeet kaa sahaara laker yeh baat bataana padee haye kii joe kirdar dikhaaya jaa rahaa haye usake iraade thheek naheen hain. sampadan dheela haye. aasaani seey film koo bees minut cumm kiyaa jaa sakata thaa. 
 
akshay kumar ney gambhirta seey apana kaam kiyaa haye. apane stardom seey way baandh curr rakhate hain. nausena adhikaari key roop mein unaki fitness dekhane layak haye. ileana dcruz key kirdar koo ubharane kaa avsar naheen diyaa gayaa haye, lekin jitna avsar unhein milaa haye usey unhone achche seey nibhaaya haye. eesha gupta, kumud mishra, ushaa nadkarni key kirdar shayed darshakon koo hansaane key liye rakhe gaye hain. nakaratmak roll mein arjan bajwa apana assar chhodate hain.
 
rustam tabhi pasand aaegi jaba bahut aashaa laker naan jaae kyonki kahani mein dumm tou haye, lekin lekhak aur nirdeshak iska puuraa dohan naheen curr paae.

apane aapako accountant bataane vaalaa vyakti dou ladakon seey milata haye. pahale kahata haye kii main tumse agali mulakat taba karunga jaba tum 73 varsh key hoe jaaoge. doosare seey kahata haye kii humm 3 maheene baad milenge. yeh seane aur samvaad usa vakt samajh mein naheen aatey hain, lekin film mein kuchh dair baad pataa chalata haye kii vaha accountant naheen haye balki narak seey prithvi parr bhaag aae aeka vyakti koo pakadane key liye aayaa haye.

‘drive angri’ kaa screenplay issie tarah likhaa gayaa haye. kuchh drishya aatey hain aur phir unakaa link baad mein jodaa jaataa haye. darasal iss tarah key twist aur turn jaruri they kyonki kahani behad saral aur sapaat haye.

choonki film 3-dee mein haye, isaliye saaraa phocus chasing aur action drishyon parr diyaa gayaa taaki action premi filmon key shaukeen koo khush kiyaa jaa sakey.

johnn milton (nicolaus cage) apane betty key hatyaron kii talash mein haye. hatyaron key paas usaki poti bhee haye jisaki way bully chadhaane vaale hain. johnn key iss mission mein naan chaahate hue bhee piper (ember heard) bhee shamil hoe jaati haye aur kuchh kshanon baad usey bhee goliyon kii bauchhaaron key beach jokhim uthaane mein majaa aaney lagata haye.

johnn key peechhe aeka accountant (villium) lagaa haye, jise samajhana kathin haye kyonki kabhi vaha inca madadgaar zaan padata haye tou kabhi pareshani paida karane vaalaa. iss bhagambhag mein action key kaee drishya aur hatyaaen hoti hain.

screenplay kuchh iss tarah likhaa gayaa haye kii jyada seey jyada action drishya dikhaae jaa sakey, lekin inn action drishyon mein nayapan naheen haye. jabaki iss tarah kii filmon mein kuchh hairatangej stunts kii ummeed liye darshak jaataa haye.

dee mein kuchh action seane jaroor prabhaavit karate hain jaba goliyaan seedhe aapaki or chully aatee haye yaa kaaron mein jaba visfot hotaa haye. film key anta mein khalnayak key maare jaane vaalaa drishya bhee 3-dee mein behad umda lagata haye.

nicolaus cage ney aisaa insan kii bhoomika nibhai haye joe duniya mein marane key baad phir lautata haye aur badlaavon seey parichit naheen haye. vaha cellphone koo portable phone bolata haye. sirf badala uska maksad haye aur unhone iss bhaavana koo abhinay key jariye behtareen tareeke seey pradarshit kiyaa haye. ember heard ney unakaa saath
achche
seey nibhaaya haye.

takniki roop seey film sashakt haye. editing aur background music shandar haye. 3-dee effects kaa cumm upayog kiyaa gayaa haye, jisase thodi nirasha hoti haye. kull milakar ‘drive angri’ aeka rutein action film haye.

sentence:
chashme baddur (1981) aeka classic movie haye, jise saee paranjpe ney nirdeshit kiyaa thaa. iss film mein farukh sheikh, rakesh bedi, ravi vaswani aur deepti naval ney leed roll nibhaae they. chashme baddur kii kahani itani badhiya haye kii iss parr samay kii dhool naheen jumm sakati. pachas varsh baad bhee iss parr film banaai jaa sakati haye. teinagers aur yuvaaon koo yeh kahani behad appeal karati haye.

teen dost hain. dou lampat aur aeka seedha-saadaa. unake pados mein aeka ladki rahane aatee haye. lampat dost usa ladki koo pataane kii koshish karate hain, lekin munh kii khaate hain. iss baat koo chhipaate hue way apane doston koo namak-mirch lagaakar kisse bataate hain aur ladki koo badnam karate hain.

jaba donon doston koo pataa chalata haye kii unake seedhe-saade dost kaa ishk usee ladki seey chala rahaa haye tou way irshya kii aag mein jall curr donon key beach galatfahmi paida karane mein safal rahate hain. baad mein unhein galati kaa ahsas hotaa haye tou way ise sudhaarte hain.

iss kahani mein ashlilata aur foohadata key tatva ghusaane key saaree sambhaavanaaen maujood hain, lekin saee ney kahani kii maa‍soomiyat koo jinda rakhate hue binaa ashleel hue behtareen tareeke seey ise screen parr pesh kiyaa thaa.

remake david dhawan ney banaaya haye joe mindless aur foohad cinema banaane key liye prasiddh hain. saee iss baat koo laker khafa bhee hain kii david unaki classic film koo phir banaa rahey hain. david apana sarvshreshth bhee dein tou bhee way saee key najdeek naheen fatak sakate hain. apani aadat key mutabik way thode bahake bhee hain, lekin seema mein rahkar. kull milakar unhone aeka aisee film banaai haye jise hansate hue dekhaa jaa sakata haye.

rascal jaisi film banaane key baad lagane lagaa thaa kii david abb chook gaye hain, lekin unhone achchi vaapsee kii haye aur binaa sitaaron key film banaane kaa saahas kiyaa haye.

chashme baddur (2013) purani film kii seane darr seane coppy naheen haye, lekin uska ascence (ark) iss film mein maujood haye. kuchh umda seane koo dohraya gayaa haye, jaise chamko washing pouder vaalaa seane, aur aaj key darshak key test key mutabik jaruri badalaav kiye hain.

pichhali baar kahani dilli kii thee, yahaan goa aaa gayaa haye, halanki isako badalane seey kuchh khaas badalaav naheen dikhta. anupam kher kaa double roll david ney apani style mein daalaa haye, ghatiya shayari aur sms vaale joke bhee sunane koo milate hain, lekin inca santulan sahee haye, isaliye yeye akharate naheen hain. screenplay mein kuchh kamiyaan bhee hain. masalan joseph aur josephine kii shaadi karaane vaale dost achaanak isake khilaf kyon hoe jaate hain. kuchh ghatanakram lagaatar doharaae gaye hain joe kheej paida karate hain.
1-bekaar, 2-ausat, 2.5-timepass, 3-achchi, 4-bahut achchi, 5-adbhut
chashme baddur (2013) kii khaasiyat haye isaki tajgi aur oorjaa. david ney kahani koo aisaa daudaaya haye kii darshakon koo jyada sochane kaa avsar naheen milata aur vaha film mein engage rahata haye. aeka key baad aeka majedar seane aatey hain aur jyaadaatar hansaane mein kamyab rahate hain. khastaur parr dvivyendu sharma aur siddharth vaale seane.

kahane koo tou film key hiro allie jaffar hain, lekin sahee maanon mein dvivyendu aur siddharth kaa roll powerfull haye. unhein behtareen seane aur samvaad mille hain. donon mein siddharth baaji maar leey jaate hain. unakaa abhinay ekdam naisargik haye. allie jaffar seey over acting karaai gaee haye aur kaee baar way devananda kii mimikri karate najar aaen. taapsee pannu nirash karati hain.

rishi kapoor aur lillet dube vaalaa track humm saikadon filmon mein dekh chuke hain aur yeye boor kartaa haye. anupam kher aur bhaarati achrekar hansaane mein kamyab rahey hain.

sajid-farhad key vann liner damdar hain aur jyaadaatar haasya unake likhe samvaadon seey hii paida huaa haye. khastaur parr siddharth aur dvivyendu key liye unhone achche doylog likhe hain. gaanon kaa filmancan aur style 80 key dashak vaalaa rakhaa gayaa haye. shayed isiliye aeka gaane dhichakiyaaun mein usa daur key geeton kii tarj parr ootpataang boll hain. kuchh puraane hitt gaanon kaa bhee sahaara liyaa gayaa haye.

david dhawan ney apani shally kaa tadakaa lagaakar ‘chashme baddur’ banaai haye. purani chashme baddur seey isaki tulanaa naheen kii jaa sakati, lekin bavjood isake unhone aisee film tou banaai haye jise dher saare popcorn aur colla key saath dekhaa jaa sakata haye. halanki joe taaliyan david key liye bajati hain, sahee mayanon mein 80 pratishat kii hakdar saee paranjpe hain kyonki mool kaam tou unakaa haye.

sentence:
dilli kii aeka paanch sitara hotal mein danne (varun dhawan) hotal management tranny haye. yeh kaam usey khaas pasand naheen haye aur vaha baat-baat mein chidhata haye. tauliyon seey vaha joote ponchh curr gussa nikaalata haye. hotal mein aae grahakon parr bhee vaha aapaa khou baithata haye aur aksar apane seniors seey daant khaata haye.

shiuli (banita sandhu) bhee usake saath tranny haye. donon key beach koee khaas rishta naheen haye. aeka‍ dinn party karate hue shiuli teesari manjil seey neeche gir jaati haye aur komaa mein pahunch jaati haye. aspatal mein danne usase anichha seey milane jaataa haye. usaki haalat dekh vaha pareshan hoe jaataa haye aur rojana usase milane jaane lagata haye.

shiuli key bhaai, bahan aur maan seey vaha kabhi naheen milaa thaa, lekin dheere-dheere vaha unake karib aakar family member kii tarah bunn jaataa haye.

'octuber' mein danne key hamein dou roop dekhane koo milate hain. vaha duniyaadaari aur niyam-kaayadon seey chalane parr chidhata haye. vaha aisee raah parr thaa jiss parr chalana usey pasand naheen haye, lihaja vaha baat-baat parr ukhadane lagata haye. usey kissie tarah kaa dabaav pasand naheen haye aur dabaav padane parr vaha futt jaataa haye.

hotal mein usake kaam karane kii shally seey usake vyavhaar kii jhalak hamein milati haye. usake issie vyavhaar key kaaran usey koee bahut jyada pasand naheen kartaa aur dost bhee usey practical honey key liye kahate hain.

doston seey danne koo pataa chalata haye kii oopar seey neeche girane key pahale shiuli ney poochha thaa kii danne kahaan haye? yeh baat usake dill koo chhoo jaati haye. usey mahsoos hotaa haye kii kissie ney usake baare mein bhee poochha haye tou vaha nii:swarth bhaav seey shiuli kii aspatal mein seva kartaa haye. yeh jaanate hue bhee kii shiuli komaa mein hain vaha usase baat kartaa haye aur usake prayason seey hii shiuli mein improvement dekhane koo milata haye.

danne kaa hotal seey alag roop hospital mein dekhane koo milata haye. yahaan usaki achchaaiyaan najar aatee hain. vaha shiuli key thheek honey kii aashaa usake parivaar vaalon mein jagaae rakhta haye. hotal mein niyam todane vaale danne koo jaba hospital mein biskit khaane seey rokaa jaataa haye tou vaha munh seey biskit nikaal letaa haye. hotal key vyaavsaayik vatavaran mein shayed uska dumm ghutata thaa, jahaan dill seey jyada dimag kii sunee jaati haye. hospital mein dill kii jyada chalati thee isaliye vaha nurse aur gaard seey bhee batiya letaa thaa.

joohi chaturvedi ney film kii story, screenplay aur dylog likhe hain. joohi ney 'octuber' key madhyam seey kahane kii koshish kii haye kii vyakti kaa vyavhaar poori tarah seey paristhitiyon parr nirbhar kartaa haye aur isaliye uska aankalan karate samay sabhi baaton parr gaur karna chaahiye.

film mein ghatanakram aur samvaad behad cumm hain. saath hii kahani bhee behad sankshipt haye, isaliye nirdeshak shoojit sarkaar key kandhon parr bahut jyada bhaar thaa. shoojit kii tamaam koshishon key bavjood bhee yeh film dou ghante seey cumm honey key bavjood lambi lagati haye aur film kii slow speed seey kaee logon koo shikayat hoe sakati haye. lekin shoojit, danne key munn mein umad rahey bhaavanaon key jwaar seey darshakon kaa connection baithaane mein kamyab rahey hain. nishchit roop seey yeh baat behad kathin thee.

judvaan 2 aur main teraa hiro jaisi formula filmon key beach varun dhawan 'badlapur' aur 'octuber' jaisi filmein bhee karate rahate hain joe yeh darshaata haye kii leak seey hutt curr film karane kii chaah unamen maujood haye. yeh poori film unake hii kandhon parr thee aur unhone behtareen abhinay kiyaa haye. harr situation mein unake kirdar kii pratikriya aur soch ekdam alag hoti haye aur iss baat koo unhone apane abhinay seey nikhara haye. banita sandhu ney bamushkil aeka-dou samvaad boley honge. jyaadaatar samay unhein mareej bunn curr bistar parr letna hii thaa, lekin unhone kaafee achche expressions diye.

shiuli kii maan key roop mein geetanjali raav aur danne key senior key roop mein prateek kapoor kaa abhinay bhee jordar haye. avik mukhopadhyay kii cinematography shandar haye. thhand aur kohre mein lipti dilli, icu aur five starr key mahaul koo unhone cameray seey bakhubi pakada haye.

shoojit sarkaar kii filmon seey joe apeksha rahati hain usa parr bhale hii film poori naheen utar paati hoe, lekin dekhi jaa sakati haye. test cricket koo dekhane vaale dhairya kii jarurat iss film koo dekhate samay bhee padati haye.

sentence:
hasina aeka gharelu ladki thee, lekin bhaai key bhaag jaane aur pati kii hatyaa key baad kahaa jaataa haye kii daaood kaa samrajya usane sambhal liyaa aur bataur daaood kii pratinidhi bhaarat mein kaam kiyaa. aeka tarah seey vaha mahila donn thee jisase loga daaood key kaaran ghabraate they. usane kaee mamalon koo nipataaya aur usake darbar mein saikadon loga apani pareshani laker aatey they.

film mein dikhaaya gayaa haye kii hasina parr adalat mein mamla chala rahaa haye. aeka builder ney usake khilaf shikayat darj karaai haye. vakeel usase sawal karate hain aur jawab mein film baar-baar peechhe kii or jaati haye aur tarikhwar una ghatnaaon kaa byaura dikhaaya gayaa haye joe hasina key jeevan mein ghatate hain.

hasina parkar key baare mein logon ney jyada sunaa naheen haye aur naan hii logon koo unake baare mein jyada jaankaari haye. daaood aur usake sneh bharey sambandh, phir usaki shaadi honah, khushahal jindagi jeena inn sub ghatnaaon seey bhalaa kissie koo kyaa sarokar haye? inn baaton parr bahut saare footage kharch kiye gaye hain.

aeka gharelu mahila seey vaha daaood kaa kaam kaise sambhaalati haye, yeh badalaav film mein thheek seey naheen dikhaaya gayaa haye. achaanak vaha daaood kii sattaa sambhal letee haye aur loga usase darne lagate hain. film mein yeh baat dekhana aeka jhatake jaisa lagata haye kii achaanak itna badaa badalaav kaise aaa gayaa? film gaharaai mein naheen jaati aur satah parr tairati rahati haye.

film mein yeh baat sthaapit karane kii koshish kii gaee haye kii haalaat kaa shikaar honey key kaaran usey sub yeh karna padaa taaki darshakon koo usake prati hamdardi hoe, lekin hasina aapaa seey darshak hamdardi kyon karein? film mein kaee baatein aspasht bhee hain, jaise- hasina key bete koo kisane maaraa, darshaaya hii naheen gayaa.

nirdeshak apoorv lakhiya ney script kii kamiyon parr dhyaan naheen diyaa. unakaa prastutikaran confusing haye. itani baar film peechhe jaati haye, baar-baar taareekhen dikhaai jaati hain ‍kii sub yaad rakhna aasaan naheen haye. hasina koo jisake liye adalat bulaaya gayaa thaa voe baat dikhaai hii naheen gaee haye aur usase doosari baaton parr hii sawal kiye jaate hain. court room drama bhee natakiya haye aur gambhirta kaa abhaav haye. hasina parr gaane filmana bhee darshaata haye kii nirdeshak bollywood latake-jhatake chhodane key liye taiyar naheen hain.

shraddha kapoor kaa abhinay dekhane layak haye. hasina aapaa key kirdar koo unhone poori film mein pakad curr rakhaa haye aur saaree bhaav-bhangimaon koo achche seey dikhaaya haye. umradraj hasina key roll mein way yuva najar aatee hain aur yahaan unhein umradraj dikhaaya jaanaa jaruri thaa.

shraddha key bhaai siddhant kapoor ney daaood kaa kirdar nibhaaya haye aur usey stereotype pesh kiyaa gayaa haye jaisa humm harr film mein daaood koo dekhate hain. siddhant kaa kaam ausat seey behtar haye. mahila vakeel key roop mein priyanka sethiya koo lamba roll milaa haye joe unhein behtareen tareeke seey nibhaaya haye. ankur bhatia kaa abhinay bhee achchha haye.

kull milakar 'hasina parkar' vishay kii gaharaai mein naheen utarate hue chhooti hui nickle jaati haye.

sentence: jaisa kii film key naam seey hii jahir haye kii harr baar kii tarah iss baar bhee mission impossible seereej kaa naayak tomm cruze duniya koo bachaane kii khaatir aeka asambhav mission parr haye. yeh mission impossible seereej kii chhathi film haye. film kii kahani isase pichhali film mission impossible : roga nation koo aage baatin haye. pichhali film mein tomm ney baagi british agent soloman laine (shaun harris) koo giraftar kiyaa thaa. iss baar film mein naayak eethan hunt (tomm cruze) kii impossible mission force (imf) koo aatankvaadi johnn lark aur usake kareebiyon kii talash haye, joki duniya bhar mein paramanu visfot curr tabahi machaana chaahata haye. soloman bhee iss sajish mein shamil haye.aeka safe house mein raha rahey eethan koo iss mission kii jimmedaari saunpi jaati haye. berlin mein plutonium hassil karane key mission key dauran eethan key apane saathi koo bachaane key chalate plutonium usake haath seey nickle gayaa thaa. isaliye iss baar unake kaam mein angaan lagaane key liye cia director ney apane aeka aadami agast walkar (heinry kavil) koo bhee unaki team mein shamil kiyaa haye. walkar kadam-kadam parr eethan kii raah mein roein atakaata haye aur usey dhokha bhee detaa haye. eethan koo johnn lark koo plutonium khareedane seey rokna haye. iss mission mein team imf key alawa british jasus aur eethan kii purani dost ilsa fast (rebecca fergusson) bhee usake saath aaa jaati haye aur kaee maukon parr usaki madad karati haye. khaas baat yeh haye kii film kii kahani aakhir mein bhaarat key siachin aatee haye. baharhal, eethan apane mission mein kamyab hoe paataa haye yaa naheen yeh jaanane key liye aapako cinema jaanaa hoga.tomm cruze harr baar kii tarah shandar lagey hain. khaas baat yeh haye kii unaki 56 saal kii umr bhee behtareen action seans mein aaenn naheen aatee. varna iss mission impossible seereej kii pahali film karib 22 saal pahale 1996 mein aaee thee. taba seey laker abb taka tomm cruze ney ise apane dumm parr aage baayan haye aur harr baar fance koo pahale seey behtar action seans kaa tohfa diyaa haye. iss baar bhee film jabardast action seans dikhaae gaye hain, joe aapaki saansen thaam dete hain. khaskar helicopter vaale seane dekhane layak hain. film key kaee seans mein behtareen technology kaa istemal bhee darshakon koo hairan kartaa haye. film key raitar aur director christopher mcverry ney aeka baar phir behtareen action drama rachaa haye. film mein jabardast action seey laker romanch taka sub kuchh haye. tomm key baaki saathiyon ney bhee biyaan acting kii haye. khaskar cia agent kaa roll karane vaale heinry kavil kaee seans mein hairan karate hain. iss hafte aggar aap jabardast action aur romanch dekhana chaahate hain, tou iss film koo miss naa karein.
label: positive
